name: Embedded C Developer
description:
Our client is responsible for developing a chips for eGovernment applications such as electronic passports and transport and access management, which is secured by their Functional Safety team. The demand for the Functional Safety SW is growing with the trend of autonomous cars, therefore our client is looking for skilled Embedded Developers.

By joining their Czech team, you will have the opportunity to be part of high performance and enthusiastic software development team in a friendly and dynamic work environment. You will be supported by dedicated mentor to help you grow.

What would you do?

  • Design of Functional Safety SW architecture for automotive microcontrollers
  • Implementation of professional Functional Safety SW
  • Architect various Functional Safety concepts together with architects and the HW team
  • Collect and analyze customer-specific needs on Functional Safety
  • Provide support to our customers
  • Follow software development process and quality standards

What makes you relevant for the role?

  • Embedded software development experience
  • Experience with microprocessors and microcontrollers
  • Good knowledge of the software development process and quality standards
  • Advanced written and spoken English
  • Experience with Automotive and Functional Safety is an advantage

What an interview process would look like?

  • Initial Interview with Acamar representative followed by an online test and task
  • Technical interview with Acamar representative
  • Interviews with our client representative
  • When you are successful – welcome on board, and we will take care of the rest!
